Text.Page:
Ksharan forces loyal to Thulsa threaten our control of Darkquaver Woods. They must be eliminated.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:55#13#Ksharan shadow archers}, {@LinkCreature:55#14#reavers}, {@LinkCreature:55#15#berserkers}, and {@LinkCreature:55#16#mystics}.

Report to Jola at Valumnir Outpost when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
